effect: Eliminates all weather effects on the field while the Pokémon is active.
synergies: Pokémon weak to weather-based damage (e.g., Rock, Fire, Ice, Water types)
Teams that rely on consistent move accuracy unaffected by weather
notes: Does not prevent the activation of weather; merely nullifies its effects. Also negates the effects of Delta Stream, Primordial Sea, and Desolate Land.
